name: v1.39.0
body: Added an ability to configure max trace size.

name: v1.38.0
body: - Bumped `github.com/gin-gonic/gin` from `1.6.3` to `1.7.0`.

name: v1.37.0
body: - Added support for API Gateway V2 HTTP APIs.

name: v1.36.0
body: - Added redis wrapper tests.

name: v1.35.0
body: - Fixed Raised User Errors in HTTP Mux

name: v1.34.0
body: - Support trace creation for timed out lambda invocations.

name: v1.33.0
body: - Added go-redis support.

name: v1.32.0
body: Added Epsagon support for Mongo.

name: v1.31.0
body: - Removed unused dependencies.

name: v1.30.0
body: Adding Epsagon middleware for Fiber.

name: v1.29.0
body:
CHANGELOG --

Updated APIGW extractor in net/http.Client.Do()

name: v1.28.0
body:
CHANGELOG --

Fixed HTTP response APIGW extractor

name: v1.27.0
body:
Added support for the following DDB operations:
- Query
- QueryWithContext
- TransactWriteItems
- TransactWriteItemsWithContext

name: v1.25.0
body: Added OldImage field collection for Lambda DDB triggers.

name: v1.24.0
body:
Added SendStopSignal to tracer.
Fixed gin wrapper to send traces async.

name: v1.23.0
body: - Setting authorization header when sending traces.

name: v1.22.0
body: - AWS sdk / SNS: adding support for TargetArn.

name: v1.19.0
body:
* http ListenAndServe, Gin support
* ignoredKeys to mask metadata keys
* custom labels not trimmed

name: v1.14.0
body: - Adding a fix to missing big traces by trimming traces metadata.

name: v1.13.0
body: Epsagon HTTP transport layer - response truncation bug fix.

name: v1.11.0
body: Epsagon HTTP Transport layer bug fixes.

name: v1.9.0
body: Fixed bugs related to custom trace labels/errors.

name: v1.8.0
body:
- Adding wrappable  TracingSupport
- HTTP Tracing - collecting only first header value

name: v1.7.0
body: added TracingTransport for http.Client.

name: v1.6.0
body:
- Adding custom labels support.
- Adding custom errors support.

name: v1.5.0
body: Adding HTTP trace correlation support

name: v.1.4.0
body: Adding support for concurrent generic function wrapper.

name: v1.2.0
body:
- Adding support for generic function wrapper.
- aws-sdk v2 STS support.

name: v1.1.0
body:
* Adding support for aws sdk v2.
* Case insensitive environment variables flags.

name: v1.0.4
body: collect errors in more scenarios, for issue manager
